definitions: Made a small hole in something with a sharp point.
Caused a sudden, sharp pain or discomfort.
Stimulated or provoked a feeling or emotion.
Made an animal raise its ears.
Marked or pierced with a pricker or similar tool.
examples: She pricked her finger on a rose thorn.
A sudden thought pricked his conscience.
The dog pricked its ears at the sound.
His curiosity was pricked by the mystery.
